home.title: Std Codes Groups
home.createLabel: Create a new Std Codes Group
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Std Codes Group

stdCodesGroup.created: A new Std Codes Group is created with identifier {{ param }}
stdCodesGroup.updated: A Std Codes Group is updated with identifier {{ param }}
stdCodesGroup.deleted: A Std Codes Group is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Std Codes Group {{ id }}?

help.groupCode: Code of the group of codes
help.groupDesc: Group description (name of the list of codes)
help.systemInd: System indicator. Can hold values ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', the elements of the group cannot be modified by end-users using the system configuration module. However, their description can be changed and they can be translated.
help.secLevelRequired: If the elements in this group have an associated security level. Can be set to ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', all the elements of the group must have a security level in STD_CODES.SEC_LEVEL.
help.valueRequired: If the elements in this group have a value. Can be set to ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', all the elements of the group must have a value and their type must be specified in VALUE_TYPE.
help.valueType: Type of the value of all the elements in this group. Can be one of ''D'' (Date), ''S'' (String), ''N'' (Number) or ''B'' (Boolean). Can be set only when CODES_VALUE_REQUIRED = ''Y''.
help.descriptionRequired: Can hold values ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''N'', codes are never shown to end-users and don''t require an entry in STD_CODES_DESC. When ''Y'', EXTERNAL_CODE_REQUIRED must be set.
help.externalCodeRequired: If the elements in this group are identified by a multilingual code shown to the user. Can hold values ''Y'' or ''N''. When set to ''Y'', the length of external codes must be specified in EXTERNAL_CODE_LENGTH. External codes are used as shortcuts in entry fields linked to drop-down lists of values.
help.externalCodeLength: Number of characters of the external codes. Can be set only when EXTERNAL_CODE_REQUIRED is ''Y''.
help.parentGroupRequired: If this group has a parent group. Can be set to ''Y'' or ''N''. When ''Y'', the parent group code must be specified in PARENT_GROUP_CODE. Used for multi-level lists of values.
help.parentGroupCode: The code of the parent group. Must be set when PARENT_GROUP_REQUIRED is ''Y''.
help.touppercase: The shortcut code is shown by uppercase or not
